Name: Puzzle Tower
About the game: The Puzzle Tower was constructed to store away the worlds most powerful weapon. Only someone who is able to reach the top of the tower would be deemed worthy enough to wield the weapon. Each floor on the tower is full of unique puzzles, traps, and monsters. Are you skilled enough to reach the top of the tower? Set in medieval times, Puzzle Tower offers players a unique twist on puzzle games. An ancient relic that is capable of godlike powers has been stored at the top of the tower. Starting at the base of the tower, your goal is to navigate through each floor one by one until you reach the top. On each floor, you'll be faced with numerous different types of obstacles such as puzzles, traps, and boss fights. Using only your brain, are you skilled enough to be the first warrior to reach the top of the tower? Features - 18 unique and in-depth floors to complete. - Mind-twisting puzzles and boss fights - Fully interactive first-person experience - Extensive single player experience with medieval atmosphere - Full integration of Steam Achievements
